6.5 Gaussian Distribution
The Gaussian distribution is the most well-studied probability distribution
for continuous-valued random variables. It is also referred to as thenormal normal distribution
distribution. Its importance originates from the fact that it has many com- The Gaussian
distribution arises
naturally when we
consider sums of
independent and
identically
distributed random
variables. This is
known as the
central limit
